thread.title: Trump on NK summit: "If it happens, it happens"

title: Trump on NK summit: "If it happens, it happens"
text:
Trump on NK summit: "If it happens, it happens" 8:25pm BST - 01:58
President Donald Trump on Thursday distanced himself from comments by national security adviser John Bolton that the ''Libyan model'' could be applied to North Korea. The comments apparently angered Pyong Yang and cast doubt on a planned summit with Kim Jong Un. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
